excerpt.rendered:
The Macallan Diamond Jubilee celebrates the Queen’s 60 glorious years of reign, from 1952 till 2012. Matured in sherry oak and bottled at 52%, there are only a limited run of 2012 bottles produced globally. A true collector’s item.

Bottle size : 700
Distillery : Macallan
Age : NAS
Vintage : 
ABV : 52.00%
